title: Track Input
description:
Plugin responsible to configure a track's input.
As any plugin it can be defined as an object with a "type" property that identifies the input to be used. Check the documentation for that property for details about what input types are supported.

channel.title: Input Channel
channel.description: Optional MIDI channel to be used for this track input. If the channel number is set, it marks a filtering of all incoming MIDI messages that have that channel number. If it's not set or it's null, all messages will pass.

allOf.title: Input MIDI Device ID
allOf.description: Unique identifier of the associated MIDI input device.

trackId.title: Input Track ID
trackId.description: Identifier of the track that this input is connected to.

type.title: Track Input Type
type.description:
Name that serves as a unique identifier of a Track Input Type. The following values are allowed:
- "device": allows configuring a MIDI device as a track input.
"track": allows configuring another track's output as the input of this track.
